item.title: #tidytuesday, 1/29/2022, Board Games
item.description: Like any good nerd, I enjoy a good game. Games have rules, and learning to navigate and bend rules are what good data scientists are always trying to do. We try to take advantages of the way natural systems are built to model them in the most effective way possible. So when I saw this weeks tidy tuesday dataset, I was stoked. First, a tad of exploratory analysis.
